Aurora

Current status: testing

First Vesper kitesurf board. Prototype model for testing purposes. Ride it and give us some feedback.

Testing spots
Length 138 cm 141 cm
Width 42 cm 43 cm
Rocker 50 mm 50 mm
Rider weight 60-90 kg 70-100 kg
Flex 5/5 5/5

Technology used in Aurora kitesurf board.

Spine of every board. Cut, dried and assembled in own lumber mill.

Entropy resin. High performance composite. Binds whole board in one piece.

Flex and strength. Multi directional fiber orientation for best performance and weight.

Resin infused rail into woodcore.

Single concave for control and upwind.

Continuous rocker for optimal performance

Topsheet and base made from polyamid - strongest material possible.
